title: Liam Hanley, intensely poetic artist who also spent 25 years writing news reports for ITN – obituary
text:
Liam Hanley, who has died aged 86, combined a lifetime of professional journalism that included some 25 years as a writer on ITN News with a no less distinguished career as a painter of semi-abstract, often unmistakably surrealistic, landscapes and seascapes; they were intensely poetic works which won him an increasingly admiring following and a successful solo show in 2014 at that bastion of English Modernist art, Crane Kalman.

It was a characteristically independent and distinctly unconventional solution to that age-old problem of how to support a wife and family while embarking on the long, and often financially unrewarding, business of establishing yourself as a painter. But with journalism’s...
